amendment.description: Amendment provides $25 million for the State Energy Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restore the $25 million level for State Energy Grants programs (by offset).

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 204 (Roll no. 198).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. DeLauro.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
